results.title: This is my world
results.brief_description: Leanne is a virtual popstar. The artist dressed as the character Leanne (modeled on an anime character) sings a sorrowful pop song about her lonely world. The video is shot in the liminal no-place space of the Shopping Centre.
results.description: Leanne is a virtual popstar. The artist dressed as the character Leanne (modeled on an anime character) sings a sorrowful pop song about her lonely world. The video is shot in the liminal no-place space of the Shopping Centre.

results.title: This is my home
results.creator_credit: Roy A. Driver and Herschells Films
results.brief_description: Care and accommodation for the elderly in Victoria; shows the variety of specially planned homes available - individual houses with gardens in selectged areas; units of ten self-contained flats; flatettes with a community lounge; large homes with a matron presiding; small hospitals where patients are encouraged to walk again. Also stresses the importance of practising handicrafts, hobbies and gardening and being generally active.

results.title: This is me
results.creator_credit: Ron Tunis, Francine Desbiens and ONF | NFB
results.brief_description: Some of life’s most profound questions are tackled by ten children ranging in age from six to eleven. They give their spontaneous views on God, the beginning of life, what happens to the spirit when one dies, where one’s soul goes at night, and numerous other questions about life. The magic of animation and modern camera techniques illustrate the children’s imaginative ruminations and conclusions. This is a delightful film for children and adults. (Award: Yorkton.)

results.title: This is Marshall McLuhan: the medium is the massage
results.creator_credit: Ernest Pintoff, Guy Fraumeni, McGraw-Hill Films and National Broadcasting Company
results.brief_description: Professor McLuhan was a controversial Canadian scholar. In this program, he presents a variety of pictorial and editing techniques using images to explore the changes bought about by electronic technology and the effects of mass media on individuals and society, He aims to stimulate a re-examination of the contemporary world and discusses his own theories and the reactions to them.
results.title_for_label: This is Marshall McLuhan: the medium is the massage

results.title: This is London
results.creator_credit: Jo Jago, Howard Thomas and Associated British-Pathe
results.brief_description: Rex Harrison conducts us on a tour of the most interesting and exciting city in the world; showing places and events of interest to the overseas visitor, which give an attractive picture of the city’s pageantry, people and life.

results.title: This is Lloyd's
results.creator_credit: Eric Fullilove, Terry Ashwood and Associated British-Pathe
results.brief_description: Covers the history of Lloyd’s and shows how the market works, and how insurance business is placed. The diversity of risks accepted by Lloyd’s is indicated, from livestock and prize-fights to aviation and motor insurance. The film shows the committee room during the ballot for election of candidates for the committee in session and the work of its staff behind the scenes, and visits a Lloyd’s agency.

results.title: This is Korea
results.brief_description: An account of present-day life in Korea pictured against the background of the Korean conflict. Shows the Korean landscape; the old culture and peace time pursuits of the peoples; Seoul and Fusan before the war; United Nations Forces in action against the Communists; the New Zealand frigate Taupo engaging a shore battery; the combined action of the Commonwealth Forces; New Zealand servicemen on leave in Japan.

results.title: This is Gibraltar
results.brief_description: A review of daily life in the British colony of Gibraltar, the unique peninsula which stands at the narrow entrance to the Mediterranean. Records interviews with citizens and officials from every walk of life. The Keeper of the Barbary Apes talks about his famous charges, and closing sequences record the Ceremony of the Keys and describe its historical significance.

results.title: This is Farnborough
results.creator_credit: British Movietone News and Central Office of Information
results.brief_description: A record of the 20th Flying Display and Exhibition, 1959, at Farnborough of the Society of British Aircraft Constructors. Spectacular group flying by Royal Navy Scimitars and RAF Hunters; Britain’s principle guided missiles; the Short SC1 research aircraft; the Fairey Rotodyne; various helicopter designs; the Saunders-Rose Hovercraft.
